slides.title: Project handling
slides.description: Quick tour to and around project handling in WebIDE

slides.title: Select Directory on local drive
slides.description:
...click on button name Select Directory for Sandbox
In next step, you have to close directory window manually, to get next step.

slides.title: Assign directory
slides.description: ...select directory of yor choice. Some subdirectorys are created, if not already existing

slides.title: Open Projects window
slides.description: ...open Project window with tabs for local projects, modules and binaries.

slides.title: Projects window
slides.description:
...to open a project simply click name of project file.
Binaries(compiled assembler code and modules are listed only)

slides.title: Projects done
slides.description: ...Now that you got a first overview, check the functions by yourself and enjoy.
